summary: Norwich City Football Club, founded in 1902, is a professional team based in Norwich, England. They play in the Championship, the second-highest league in England. Their home is Carrow Road since 1935. Norwich has a big rivalry with Ipswich Town, playing the East Anglian derby since their start. They've won the League Cup twice and finished third in the Premier League in 1992-93. Known as "The Canaries," their colors are yellow and green, and their fans sing the oldest football chant, "On The Ball, City."
title: Norwich City F.C.
